title: Strengthening Patient Care Practical Competencies: Online Flipped Learning-Based EFL Writing Education Design: Motivation

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary English grammar and foundational knowledge in scientific disciplines
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can analyze five key factors that inhibit writing motivation in English as a Foreign Language (EFL) contexts.
Learners can improve academic/professional writing competencies by 20% through flipped learning-based online assignments.
Learners can achieve the ability to write scientific argumentative essays of 3,000+ characters using peer feedback and instructor coaching.
Document patterns of motivational changes experienced during the learning process through reflective journaling with over 80% accuracy
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
